title: Embroidery Sample, 1790–1800
medium:
Medium: silk, glass, paper
Technique: embroidered on cut and voided supplementary warp pile in a twill foundation (velvet)
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Floral pattern embroidered with white silk and pieces of clear glass on black velvet with vertical green twill stripes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidery Sample, 1790–1800.
1790–1800. Medium: silk, glass, paper
Technique: embroidered on cut and voided supplementary warp pile in a twill foundation (velvet). Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund. 1932-1-46.
